title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value in the list box of the report parameter is not retained after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value in the list box of the report parameter should remain unchanged after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display Type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. Check the default value in the list box.
